Definition: Internal cognitive processes involving reasoning, planning, and conscious reflection
Key_Types: Internal (private reasoning), External (verbal processing), Chain-of-thought, Insight/bridging thoughts
AI_Implementation: Chain-of-thought prompting, ReAct frameworks, Internal monologue systems

Definition: Stored representations of past experiences and learned information
Key_Types: Working (short-term active), Episodic (personal experiences), Semantic (facts/concepts), Long-term consolidated
AI_Implementation: RAG systems, Vector databases, Knowledge graphs, Memory consolidation mechanisms

Definition: Process of accessing and utilizing stored information to inform current tasks
Key_Types: Vector similarity search, Graph traversal, Pattern matching, Contextual associations
AI_Implementation: Semantic search, Graph neural networks, Hybrid retrieval systems, Multi-modal retrieval
